revised_prompt: Create a professional advertisement banner with the dimensions of 1200x628 pixels. The design should be clean, modern, and uncluttered. Make use of sans-serif fonts in a high contrast colour against a clean or subtle background. The banner should prominently feature the brand name 'TechStore', written in large and bold letters, ideally at the top or center. This should be followed by 'Up to 70% Off' in medium size located in the center area of the banner. There should be call-to-action button at the bottom or placed in such a way to be prominent, with the words 'Shop Now' written on it. The color scheme of the banner should be professional, vibrant and eye-catching. The text should stand out, and there should be a high contrast between the text and background. All elements of the banner should be presented in a clean and simple layout, ensuring everything is easy to read and that the quality is of a professional advertising standard.
